participant_1.background:
I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter.
I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others.
i spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.
I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.

participant_2.background:
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures.
i have brown hair.
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.
my nails are painted green.

content.text: Hello there! What do you like to do?
I like to start my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.
Oh that's cool! I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog. I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures.
That sounds really fun! I love to travel as well, but haven't had a chance to go geocaching yet. I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta!
That sounds amazing! I love pasta! I actually have brown hair, but I paint my nails green often. I also like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
That sounds like a great way to spend a rainy day! I also have brown hair, and I love dogs! I don't usually paint my nails, but I might try it out sometime.
You should! It's really fun to change up your look sometimes. It's also a great way to express yourself.
That's a good point! I'll definitely have to try it out. Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help.
